NavBar.Name: Search
NavBar.LinkOption: onclick="ITSM.Agent.ConfigItem.Search.OpenSearchDialog('AgentITSMConfigItemSearch'); if (event.stopPropagation) { event.stopPropagation(); } else { window.event.cancelBubble = true; } return false;"

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentCMDBAsset
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###000-Back
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to go back in the configuration item zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###200-History
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to access the history of a configuration item in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###300-Edit
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to edit a configuration item in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###400-Print
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to print a configuration item in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###500-Link
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows linking a configuration item with another object in the config item zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###600-Duplicate
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to duplicate a configuration item in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###700-ConfigItemDelete
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to delete a configuration item in its zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###800-All CI
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to access the all CI related to that ticket.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###810-MoreDetails
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to show the GLPI page based on class type

ConfigItem.Name: LinkObject::ComplexTable::SettingsVisibility###ITSMConfigItem
ConfigItem.Description: Define Actions where a settings button is available in the linked objects widget (LinkObject::ViewMode = "complex"). Please note that these Actions must have registered the following JS and CSS files: Core.AllocationList.css, Core.UI.AllocationList.js, Core.UI.Table.Sort.js, Core.Agent.TableFilters.js and Core.Agent.LinkObject.js.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::NumberGenerator
ConfigItem.Description: Selects the configuration item number generator module. "AutoIncrement" increments the configuration item number, the SystemID, the ConfigItemClassID and the counter are used. The format is "SystemID.ConfigItemClassID.Counter", e.g. 1205000004, 1205000005.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::CINameRegex
ConfigItem.Description: Defines regular expressions individually for each ConfigItem class to check the ConfigItem name and to show corresponding error messages.

Hash.Item: A computer name must start with ABC!
A hardware name must end with two digits!

ConfigItem.Name: LinkObject::DefaultSubObject###ITSMConfigItem
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default subobject of the class 'ITSMConfigItem'.

ConfigItem.Name: LinkObject::ITSMConfigItem::ShowColumnsByClass
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the shown columns of CIs in the link table complex view, depending on the CI class. Each entry must be prefixed with the class name and double colons (i.e. Computer::). There are a few CI-Attributes that common to all CIs (example for the class Computer: Computer::Name, Computer::CurDeplState, Computer::CreateTime). To show individual CI-Attributes as defined in the CI-Definition, the following scheme must be used (example for the class Computer): Computer::HardDisk::1, Computer::HardDisk::1::Capacity::1, Computer::HardDisk::2, Computer::HardDisk::2::Capacity::1. If there is no entry for a CI class, then the default columns are shown.

ConfigItem.Name: Stats::DynamicObjectRegistration###ITSMConfigItem
ConfigItem.Description: Module to generate ITSM config item statistics.

ConfigItem.Name: ImportExport::ObjectBackendRegistration###ITSMConfigItem
ConfigItem.Description: Object backend module registration for the import/export module.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::EventModulePost###100-History
ConfigItem.Description: Config item event module that enables logging to history in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::HistoryOrder
ConfigItem.Description: Shows the config item history (reverse ordered) in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentITSMConfigItemHistory
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: GeneralCatalogPreferences###DeploymentStates
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the deployment states in the preferences view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: GeneralCatalogPreferences###DeploymentStatesColors
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the deployment states color in the preferences view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Permission::Class###010-ClassGroupCheck
ConfigItem.Description: Module to check the group responsible for a class.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Permission::Item###010-ItemClassGroupCheck
ConfigItem.Description: Module to check the group responsible for a configuration item.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItem###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: Required permissions to use the ITSM configuration item screen in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemEdit###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: Required permissions to use the edit ITSM configuration item screen in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemAdd###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: Required permissions to use the add ITSM configuration item screen in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemHistory###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: Required permissions to use the history ITSM configuration item screen in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemPrint###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: Required permissions to use the print ITSM configuration item screen in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemDelete###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: Required privileges to delete config items.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemZoom###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: Required permissions to use the ITSM configuration item zoom screen in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: Required permissions to use the ITSM configuration item search screen in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AdminITSMConfigItem###EditorRows
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the number of rows for the CI definition editor in the admin interface.

ConfigItem.Name: GeneralCatalogPreferences###Permissions
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the example permission groups of the general catalog attributes.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Search###ConfigItem
ConfigItem.Description: Configuration item search backend router of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Search::JavaScript###ConfigItem
ConfigItem.Description: JavaScript function for the search frontend.

ConfigItem.Name: Loader::Agent::CommonJS###100-ConfigurationManagement
ConfigItem.Description: List of JS files to always be loaded for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: PreferencesGroups###ConfigItemOverviewSmallPageShown
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the pages (in which the configuration items are shown).

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::Overview###Small
ConfigItem.Description: Defines an overview module to show the small view of a configuration item list.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Hook
ConfigItem.Description: The identifier for a configuration item, e.g. ConfigItem#, MyConfigItem#. The default is ConfigItem#.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###SearchLimit
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the search limit for the AgentITSMConfigItemSearch screen.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###ShowColumns
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the shown columns in the config item search. This option has no effect on the position of the column.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###ShowColumnsByClass
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the shown columns of CIs in the config item search depending on the CI class. Each entry must be prefixed with the class name and double colons (i.e. Computer::). There are a few CI-Attributes that are common to all CIs (example for the class Computer: Computer::Name, Computer::CurDeplState, Computer::CreateTime). To show individual CI-Attributes as defined in the CI-Definition, the following scheme must be used (example for the class Computer): Computer::HardDisk::1, Computer::HardDisk::1::Capacity::1, Computer::HardDisk::2, Computer::HardDisk::2::Capacity::1. If there is no entry for a CI class, then the default columns are shown as defined in the setting ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItem###ShowColumns.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###SearchCSVData
ConfigItem.Description: Data used to export the search result in CSV format.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItem###SearchLimit
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the search limit for the AgentITSMConfigItem screen.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItem###ShowColumns
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the shown columns in the config item overview. This option has no effect on the position of the column. Note: Class column is always available if filter 'All' is selected.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItem###ShowColumnsByClass
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the shown columns of CIs in the config item overview depending on the CI class. Each entry must be prefixed with the class name and double colons (i.e. Computer::). There are a few CI-Attributes that are common to all CIs (example for the class Computer: Computer::Name, Computer::CurDeplState, Computer::CreateTime). To show individual CI-Attributes as defined in the CI-Definition, the following scheme must be used (example for the class Computer): Computer::HardDisk::1, Computer::HardDisk::1::Capacity::1, Computer::HardDisk::2, Computer::HardDisk::2::Capacity::1. If there is no entry for a CI class, then the default columns are shown as defined in the setting ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItem###ShowColumns.

ConfigItem.Name: UniqueCIName::EnableUniquenessCheck
ConfigItem.Description: Enables/disables the functionality to check ConfigItems for unique names. Before enabling this option you should check your system for already existing config items with duplicate names. You can do this with the script bin/otrs.ITSMConfigItemListDuplicates.pl.

ConfigItem.Name: UniqueCIName::UniquenessCheckScope
ConfigItem.Description: Check for a unique name only within the same ConfigItem class ('class') or globally ('global'), which means every existing ConfigItem is taken into account when looking for duplicates.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::BulkFeature
ConfigItem.Description: Enables configuration item bulk action feature for the agent frontend to work on more than one configuration item at a time.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::BulkFeatureGroup
ConfigItem.Description: Enables configuration item bulk action feature only for the listed groups.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentITSMConfigItemBulk
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::PreMenuModule###100-Zoom
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to zoom into a configuration item in the configuration item overview of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::PreMenuModule###200-History
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to access the history of a configuration item in the configuration item overview of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::PreMenuModule###300-Duplicate
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to duplicate a configuration item in the configuration item overview of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemBulk###DeplState
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the deployment state in the configuration item bulk screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemBulk###InciState
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the incident state in the configuration item bulk screen of the agent interface.
